function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of safe water access and appropriate sanitation can lead to increased risk of contagious diseases like COVID-19","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread and poor health outcomes","Mitigation":"Ensuring safe water access and appropriate sanitation through infrastructural support and community mobilization efforts","Technologies":"Community Led Total Sanitation (CLTS) programs, building wells, community pipes, latrines","People":"Households and communities","Owner":"Government, NGOs, community leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate hygiene practices and open defecation can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases and stunting","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and higher prevalence of childhood stunting","Mitigation":"Promoting hygienic practices, reducing open defecation, and mobilizing community health workers","Technologies":"Hygiene campaigns, Community Led Total Sanitation (CLTS) programs, community health volunteer programs","People":"Community members, especially children","Owner":"Health organizations, local authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of knowledge sharing and communication on evolving health situations can lead to inadequate response to disease outbreaks","Impact":"Reduced ability to effectively respond to health crises and contain disease spread","Mitigation":"Establishing community support groups, enhancing knowledge sharing mechanisms, and leveraging community health workers for communication","Technologies":"Community support groups, health worker programs, communication technology","People":"Community members, especially women","Owner":"Health organizations, local authorities, community leaders"}]}
